data.name: 07 Zoila Andrea Coc-Chang
data.caption: contra la pared, 2021-22. Avocado pits, achiote seeds, flor de jamaica, jasmine tea, chrysanthemum tea, orange peels, dried chili peppers, chili pepper seeds, dried black beans, cinnamon sticks, fennel seeds, peppercorn, star anise, bamboo leaves, White Rabbit candy casted in resin or sugar (most of the food ingredients are from family, friends and shared meals); 12 x 73 x 5 in. Photo: Sebastián Pérez.
